title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 98-1.20 - Waved requirements for MLTCPs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 98-1.20 - Waved requirements for MLTCPs

State Regulations

Section
365-i
of the Social Services Law, pertaining to prescription drug payments, is deemed waived for MLTCPs by the commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
98-1.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
